titleStmt.title: A declaration of the sentence and deposition of Elizabeth, the vsurper and pretensed quene of Englande
titleStmt.author: Sixtus V, Pope, 1520-1590.
Allen, William, 1532-1594, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Probably drawn up by Cardinal Wm. Allen--STC.
With ornamented factotum; woodcut panels at head.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
